education.title: August 2022 - May 2024
education.cardDetailedText: FIU has been pivotal in transforming me into a skilled coder and effective team player. Through practical experience, I've developed expertise in coding and project management, preparing me well for the challenges of the tech industry.

education.title: June 2021 - July 2022
education.cardDetailedText: During my time at MDC, I was given the opportunity to be part of the presidential society. I was invited and participated in unique co-curricular opportunities for career preparation, leadership development, academic research, civic engagement trips, social events, and more.
